short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows off campus links to be automatically generated for preferred pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin adds a button on the task bar that begins a proxy session using Queen's in-browser proxy service. It does so by transforming the URL to the proxy's form. The proxy service itself will redirect to Queen's single sign-on if the user is not already signed in. The plugin does not interact at all with the single sign-on process.

This extension is mostly useful for gaining access to academic papers that would be otherwise paywalled.
